page.title: 13CHILDREN IN HIGHAM SCHOOL
page.content: THERE ARE 73 CHILDREN IN THE SCHOOL IN 3 CLASSES.IN CLASS 3 THERE ARE ALL THE INFANTS EXCEPT THE TOP INFANTS. AT 12.15 WE GO DOWN TO DINNER.2 TEACHERS TAKE US DOWN TO DINNER.THE DINNER LADIES MAKE THE DINNER.THEN AT 1.15 WE START SCHOOL AGAIN.AT 3.30 WE GO HOME THE HEADMASTER HAS WORKED THERE FOR 14 YEARS.THE CARETAKER CLEANS THE SCHOOL IN THE MORNING AND AT NIGHT.THE LIRARIAN COMES IN ON FRIDAY AND WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON TO DO THE LIBARY.THE DINNER LADIES LOOK AFTER CHILDREN AT DINNER TIME AND COOK THE MEALS.THE SECRETARY TYPES ALL THE LETTERS,BUT SHE IS ONLY PART TIME. THE SCHOOL IS VERY MODERN AND HAS BEEN DESIGNED ON AN OPEN PLAN IDEA.THE INFANTS HAVE THEIR OWN AREA.
